title: BharatMatrimony® - Most Trusted NRI Matrimony App
description:
This is the official BharatMatrimony.com Android app for Non Residential Indians (NRI) across the globe. BharatMatrimony facilitates more marriages than any other matchmaking service in the world. We are featured in the Limca Book of World Records for the highest number of documented marriages online.
Globally, we are the most preferred NRI matrimony service provider for aspiring brides and grooms to find their perfect partner, especially for NRI communities spread over UK, USA, Canada, Australia, Singapore, UAE, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Oman, and so on. Whether it’s a fun-filled “shaadi” for a North Indian NRI family or a coveted “kalyanam” in a South Indian NRI household, our regional domains have covered them all!
Our new and improved mobile app features include: faster performance, user-friendly navigation, and amazing design. Take a look at some of its key features listed below:
• Register and create your profile through the app.
• Search for suitable matches, refine results, and save favorites for future viewing.
• Stay online and chat on-the-go through the Matrimony Messenger – anytime,
anywhere!
• Use the GPS-enabled City Search feature to find relevant matches near your location.
• Get instant notifications – never miss any communication from any prospective
matches, ever again!
• View members’ profiles, photos, and phone numbers; send interests or personalised
messages directly through mobile.
• Be 100% secure – count on us to keep all your information safe and private.
• User convenience  – the app is really lightweight and hardly takes up any space.
We have helped millions of destined couples worldwide to unite with our 14 regional matrimony portals like Tamil Matrimony, Gujarati Matrimony, Telugu Matrimony, Punjabi Matrimony and Kerala Matrimony to name a few.
As an NRI user of the app, you will find no problems browsing profiles from all Indian communities such as Nair, Ezhava, Kayastha, Arya Vysya, SC, Christian - Roman Catholic, Reddy, Maratha, Iyer, Rajput and from apps namely Brahmin Matrimony, Christian Matrimony, Divorcee Matrimony, Jain Matrimony, Muslim Matrimony, Sikh Matrimony, Vishwakarma Matrimony and more!
It is also a place where to-be couples from communities like Agrawal, Yadav, Rajput, Jain, Reddy, Aryavysya, Nadar, Adidravidar, Kamma, Lingayath, Manglik, Jat, Chettiyar, Padmasali, Kapu, Buddhist, Konguvellalar, Bhumihar find their perfect match.
Looking to search for a bride/groom based on Religion? We have matches from all religions including Hindu, Muslim, Christian, Buddhist, Jain, Christian Catholic, Christian Orthodox, Christian Protestant, Muslim Shia, and Muslim Sunni.
Our top registrations come from States namely Tamil Nadu, Maharashtra, Andhra Pradesh, Punjab,  Kerala, Uttar Pradesh, Karnataka, West Bengal, Delhi, Orissa, and Gujarat and from cities namely Chennai, Delhi, Hyderabad, Mumbai, Lucknow, Bangalore, Kolkata, Pune, Ernakulam, Trivandrum, and Coimbatore.
You can narrow your search based on the mother tongue/first language of the matches. Our top languages that people register for are Hindi, Tamil, Malayalam, Telugu, Marathi, Bengali, Punjabi, Gujarati, Kannada, and Oriya.
BharatMatrimony has been conferred with numerous national and international awards for its pioneering spirit, vision, and continuous growth through its path-breaking and innovative excellence. Some of our accolades include:
• "One of the 100 Most Innovative Companies Globally" as recognized by Red Herring
• "Most Trusted Online Matrimony" award by The Brand Trust Report
• NDTV-Hindu Lifestyle Award for the "Best Community Matrimony Website"
• Ranked twice in "Top 50 Fastest Growing Tech Companies in India" by Deloitte
• "The Most Visited Matrimony Portal in the World" by Comscore
Your privacy is a top priority for us at all times, so feel safe. We are a 100% secure app for NRI Shaadi.
To find the life partner of your dreams, download the app, it’s FREE!
